title: Settlers of Catan
description: A popular strategy board game where players collect and trade resources to build roads, settlements, and cities.
author: Klaus Teuber

title: Ticket to Ride
description: A railway-themed board game where players collect train cards and build routes across a map.
author: Alan R. Moon

title: Pandemic
description: A cooperative board game where players work together to stop the spread of deadly diseases.
author: Matt Leacock

title: Carcassonne
description: A tile-laying board game where players build a medieval landscape with cities, roads, and fields.
author: Klaus-Jürgen Wrede

title: Dominion
description: A deck-building card game where players compete to build the most powerful kingdom.
author: Donald X. Vaccarino

title: Chess
description: A classic two-player strategy board game with a history dating back over a thousand years.
author: Unknown

title: Risk
description: A global domination strategy board game where players vie for control of the world.
author: Albert Lamorisse

title: Scrabble
description: A word game where players create words on a game board using letter tiles with different point values.
author: Alfred Butts

title: The Settlers of Catan: Cities & Knights
description: An expansion for Settlers of Catan that adds new elements and challenges to the game.
author: Klaus Teuber

title: Twilight Struggle
description: A two-player game simulating the Cold War, where players compete for global influence.
author: Ananda Gupta and Jason Matthews

title: Agricola
description: A farming-themed board game where players build and manage their own farms.
author: Uwe Rosenberg

title: Betrayal at Baldur's Gate
description: A game where players explore a haunted house, but one of them may betray the group.
author: Avalon Hill

title: 7 Wonders
description: A card drafting game where players build ancient civilizations and compete for resources.
author: Antoine Bauza

title: Betrayal at House on the Hill
description: A horror-themed game where players explore a haunted mansion with a traitor mechanic.
author: Avalon Hill

title: Pictionary
description: A drawing and guessing game where players sketch clues to words and phrases.
author: Robert Angel

title: Axis & Allies
description: A WWII-themed strategy board game where players command armies and engage in global conflict.
author: Larry Harris Jr.

title: Codenames
description: A word-based party game where players give one-word clues to guess their team's secret agents.
author: Vlaada Chvátil

title: Betrayal Legacy
description: A legacy version of Betrayal at Baldur's Gate with evolving storylines over multiple sessions.
author: Avalon Hill

title: Terraforming Mars
description: A strategy game where players terraform Mars by developing industries and greenery.
author: Jacob Fryxelius

title: Gloomhaven
description: A cooperative campaign-driven dungeon crawl board game set in a dark fantasy world.
author: Isaac Childres
